fields.name: Resources
fields.fieldText:
Have you checked our HUB page and MyTrailhead library already?

If not yet, go check it out - you might find the answer to your question!

fields.name: ErrorText_0
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong during the creation or update of your Case. Please contact your system administrator with the following error message:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: ConfirmationLegalCaseScreen
fields.fieldText:
A new case has been created for the Legal Team with the following information,


  • {!LegalCategory}
  • {!TypeOfRequestLegalFormula}

fields.name: Type_of_Case
fields.fieldText: What type of Case would you like to create?

fields.name: RecordTypeDescription
fields.fieldText:
Service Case is used for Adyen Support Teams e.g.: Technical Support, Operational Support, Account Setup Operations, Disputes, Platform Monitoring. These cases are subject to auto-closure rules (if no answer is received from the merchant in 7 days) and are visible in the portal by default.

Internal Case is used for Non-Support teams e.g.: Merchant Operations, Risk, Warehousing & Logistics, Lead Qualification, Nonprofits, AM Pool. These cases are not subject to auto-closure rules (if no answer is received from the merchant in 7 days) and are not visible in the portal by default.

Tooling Support is used to submit Requests, Issues, Feedback, Feature Requests or Questions about DocuSign, Salesforce, SalesNavigator and ZoomInfo.

Legal Cases is used to request the Legal team to review contracts, be part of a negotiation or answer merchant questions.

fields.name: UploadingFilesInfoText
fields.fieldText: Note: If you upload any files, a preview of them will not be shown in this screen, but they will be added to your Case when clicking 'Next'. Also click 'Next' if you don't want to upload any files.
